scripts.mirror:on: powershell -NoProfile -Command "Start-Process node -ArgumentList 'mirror-live.js' -WindowStyle Minimized -PassThru | Select-Object -ExpandProperty Id | Set-Content .mirror-pid"
scripts.mirror:on:poll: powershell -NoProfile -Command "Start-Process node -ArgumentList 'mirror-live.js --poll' -WindowStyle Minimized -PassThru | Select-Object -ExpandProperty Id | Set-Content .mirror-pid"
scripts.mirror:off: powershell -NoProfile -Command "if (Test-Path .mirror-pid) { $mirrorPid = Get-Content .mirror-pid | Select-Object -First 1; $proc = Get-Process -Id $mirrorPid -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; if ($proc) { Stop-Process -Id $mirrorPid -Force }; Remove-Item .mirror-pid -Force } else { Write-Host 'Mirror not running (no .mirror-pid)'; }"
scripts.mirror:off:scan: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$procs = Get-CimInstance Win32_Process | Where-Object { $_.CommandLine -match 'mirror-live.js' }; if ($procs) { $procs.ProcessId | ForEach-Object { Stop-Process -Id $_ -Force }; Write-Host 'Stopped mirror-live.js process(es).' } else { Write-Host 'No mirror-live.js process found.' }; if (Test-Path .mirror-pid) { Remove-Item .mirror-pid -Force }"
